name: Application logo URL - Extjs
description: Link to the company logo to be displayed in the Extjs based application

name: Application logo URL - STouch
description: Link to the company logo to be displayed in STouch based application

name: Report logo URL
description: Link to the company logo to be displayed in the reports.

name: Check request IP
description:
Check if the remote client IP of the request is the same as the one used at login time.
Possible values: true, false

name: Check request user-agent
description:
Check if the remote client user-agent of the request is the same as the one used at login time. 
Possible values: true, false

name: Css file location for HTML export
description: Css used to style the HTML exports from grid

name: Default language
description: Default language to be used if no language preference set by user.

name: Default theme Extjs
description: Default theme to be used in Extjs based user interface if no theme preference set by user

name: Default theme STouch
description: Default theme to be used in Sencha Toucha based user interface if no theme preference set by user
